```{r}
file <- "AT_wildtype_101_Probabilities.h5"
library(cranium)
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(car)
library(rgl)

tidy_brain <- file %>%
  read_h5() %>%
  tidy()

tidy_brain_ro <- reorient(tidy_brain)

scatter3d(x = tidy_brain_ro$x, y = tidy_brain_ro$y, z = tidy_brain_ro$z)

plot2d(tidy_brain)
```
